exm.mng: railtrack connection, to integrate into sth, to dock, to connect, to be in step with, to bring into line with, to align
derailment (railway accident), to leave the rails, fig. to overstep bounds, fig. to have an extramarital affair
orbit, railway or tram line, fig. conventional way of thinking
light rail, transit system (underground, at street level or elevated), streetcar, metro, abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
